attributes.description:
Finance available. Trade-ins welcome. Delivery nationwide. Transport, admin and license fees excluded.
Body type SUV
Seats 5
Doors 5
Performance specs

Fuel consumption (economy) - extra urban 5.4 l/100 km (18.52 km/l)
Fuel consumption (economy) - combined 6.3 l/100 km (15.87 km/l)
Fuel Type Petrol (Gasoline)
Acceleration 0 - 100 km/h 9.7 sec
Maximum speed 195 km/h
Engine specs
Power 112kw @ 6000 rpm.
Torque 240 Nm @ 1600-4000 rpm.
Engine location Front, Transverse
Engine displacement 1498 cm3
Number of cylinders 4
Position of cylinders Inline
Fuel System Direct injection
Engine aspiration Turbocharger, Intercooler
Valvetrain DOHC
Space, Volume and weights
Kerb Weight 1579 kg
Max. weight 2100 kg
Max load 521 kg
Boot space - minimum 456 l
Boot space - maximum 1603 l
Fuel tank capacity 60 l
Max. roof load 75 kg
Permitted trailer load with brakes 2000 kg
Permitted trailer load without brakes 750 kg
Dimensions
Length 4531 mm
Width 1838 mm
Width with mirrors folded 1911 mm
Width including mirrors 2086 mm
Height 1703 mm
Wheelbase 2690 mm
Front track 1573 mm
Rear (Back) track 1583 mm
Minimum turning circle (turning diameter) 11.1 m
Drivetrain, brakes and suspension specs
Drive wheel Front wheel drive
Front suspension Independent type McPherson
Rear suspension Multi-link independent
Front brakes Ventilated discs
Rear brakes Disc
Assisting systems ABS (Anti-lock braking system)
Steering type Steering rack and pinion
Power steering Electric Steering
Tires size 235/50 R18
Wheel rims size 7.5 J x 18
